alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 04 at 6:48AM CDT until August 04 at 9:15AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of east central Missouri, including the following county, Jefferson. * WHEN...Until 900 AM CDT. * IMPACTS...Numerous roads remain closed due to flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 646 AM CDT, local law enforcement reported roads remains closed from up to 5 inches of rain that fell overnight. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Arnold, Byrnes Mill, Antonia, Murphy, High Ridge, Barnhart, Oakville, House Springs, Imperial, Scotsdale, Parkdale, Kimmswick and Otto.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
